pages.md:
# Checking the Battery Level

After turning the camera on, check the battery level in the display.

Battery level is shown as follows:

| Indicator        | Description                                          |
|------------------|------------------------------------------------------|
| !Battery partially discharged | Battery partially discharged.                        |
| !Battery about 80% full       | Battery about 80% full.                              |
| !Battery about 60% full       | Battery about 60% full.                              |
| !Battery about 40% full       | Battery about 40% full.                              |
| !Battery about 20% full       | Battery about 20% full.                              |
| !Low battery                  | Low battery. Charge as soon as possible.             |
| !Battery exhausted            | Battery exhausted. Turn camera off and recharge battery. |
